content.en: Ship energy optimization: Researchers are exploring ways to optimize the energy management and operation of ships to reduce costs and greenhouse gas emissions. They are using various algorithms such as Non-dominated sorting genetic algorithm II (NSGA-II), Fuzzy-based particle swarm optimization (FPSO) algorithm, and Genetic algorithms to achieve these goals. By optimizing power generation, load allocation, and energy efficiency, these algorithms can help develop more environmentally-friendly and economically efficient ships.
content.da: Skibsenergioptimering: Forskere undersøger måder at optimere energistyring og -drift af skibe på for at reducere omkostninger og drivhusgasemissioner. De anvender forskellige algoritmer som Non-dominated sorting genetic algorithm II (NSGA-II), Fuzzy-based particle swarm optimization (FPSO) algoritme og genetiske algoritmer for at nå disse mål. Ved at optimere elproduktion, lastfordeling og energieffektivitet kan disse algoritmer hjælpe med at udvikle mere miljøvenlige og økonomisk effektive skibe.
